casebody.data:
T. M. KIRKLAND et al., Appellants, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 5787. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 17, 1930. Richard E. Stillman, of Jacksonville, Ha., and Jon P. Knight, of Nashville, Ga., for appellants. Chas. L. Redding, U. S. Atty., of Savannah, Ga.

Before BRYAN and POSTER, Circuit Judges, and SIBLEY, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
